issue.title: C++: Add in-memory schema metadata container
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-21](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-21). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The schema will consist of an array of fields / table columns (name + data type). The scope is limited to what will suffice for converting other schema metadata representations (especially Parquet) to Arrow schemas.
